trans-unit.source: Creates a user-selectable list of hierarchical data source names.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma lista selecionável pelo usuário de nomes de fonte de dados hierárquicos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter> class is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object that is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter> classe é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> que normalmente é referenciado pelo objeto de <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> atributo.

trans-unit.source: All members except the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method are inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os membros, exceto o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> método são herdadas de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method indicates whether the specified component implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> método indica se o componente especificado implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter> classe quando a classe é referenciada por um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> atributo.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified component is a valid data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o componente especificado é uma fonte de dados válida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="component" /> is a valid data source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="component" /> é uma fonte de dados válida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method considers `component` a valid data source if it implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> método considera `component` uma fonte de dados válido se ele implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface.
